prune_images.description: Deletes unused images to free up space.

user.description: Manages user accounts in the system.

compute.description: Manages compute resources and their allocation.

acl.description: Manages access control lists for resources.

group.description: Manages user groups in the system.

pool.description: Manages resource pools for efficient usage.

pool_resource.description: Assigns resources to a specific pool.

node.description: Manages physical or virtual nodes in the system.

drawing.description: Creates or manages drawings/diagrams of resources.

user_from_group.description: Manages users within a specific group.

snapshot.description: Creates or manages snapshots of resources.
